message:
SYSTEM: KGEOntologies_2021.pdf: Página 25
An Ontology-Based Deep Learning Approach for Triple Classification with Out-of-Knowledge-Base Entities
Phase 2: Ontology introduction
25
For WN11, the homonym ontology is applied
For FB13, two ontologies are considered: its
corresponding ontology (Google KG’s) ontology and 
the DBpedia Ontology
Ontology classes are encoded using the same
Word2Vec model as the entities
Ontology vectors are generated using weighted
average
Ontological-information vectors remain static
throughout training
speaker: SYSTEM
